full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,'PHAGS PA 'JAM DPAL GYI BSTOD PA BYIN RLABS CAN 'JAM DBYANGS MJING YON GYI GO MI'I BSTOD PA GRAGS PA BZHUGS, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @006A *, ,(BCOM LDAN 'DAS 'PHAGS PA 'JAM PA'I DBYANGS KYI BSTOD PA BYIN RLABS DANG BCAS PA SNYAN DNGAGS @006B MKHAN RNAMS KYI GTZUG GI NOR BU BYANG CHUB SEMS DPA'I RIGS CAN MKHAS PA CHEN PO TZANDRA GO MIS MDZAD PA RDZOGS SO,, ,,RGYA GAR GYI MKHAN PO MKHAS PA CHEN PO SU MA TI KIRTI ZHAL SNGA NAS BOD KYI LOTZ'A BA DGE SLONG BLO LDAN SHES RAB DANG MAR BA CHOS KYI DBANG PHYUG GIS BSGYUR BA'O,, ,,)
translator_(орчуулагч): BLO LDAN SHES RAB, MAR BA CHOS KYI DBANG PHYUG
